verses.verse: A Song <S%H7892><s%> of degrees <S%H4609><s%>. LORD <S%H3068><s%>, remember <S%H2142><s%> David <S%H1732><s%>, and all his afflictions <S%H6031><s%>:
How he sware <S%H7650><s%> unto the LORD <S%H3068><s%>, and vowed <S%H5087><s%> unto the mighty <S%H46><s%> God of Jacob <S%H3290><s%>;
Surely I will not come <S%H935><s%> into the tabernacle <S%H168><s%> of my house <S%H1004><s%>, nor go up <S%H5927><s%> into my bed <S%H6210><s%> <S%H3326><s%>;
I will not give <S%H5414><s%> sleep <S%H8153><s%> to mine eyes <S%H5869><s%>, or slumber <S%H8572><s%> to mine eyelids <S%H6079><s%>,
Until I find out <S%H4672><s%> a place <S%H4725><s%> for the LORD <S%H3068><s%>, an habitation <S%H4908><s%> for the mighty <S%H46><s%> God of Jacob <S%H3290><s%>. an habitation: Heb. habitations
Lo, we heard <S%H8085><s%> of it at Ephratah <S%H672><s%>: we found <S%H4672><s%> it in the fields <S%H7704><s%> of the wood <S%H3293><s%>.
We will go <S%H935><s%> into his tabernacles <S%H4908><s%>: we will worship <S%H7812><s%> at his footstool <S%H1916><s%> <S%H7272><s%>.
Arise <S%H6965><s%>, O LORD <S%H3068><s%>, into thy rest <S%H4496><s%>; thou, and the ark <S%H727><s%> of thy strength <S%H5797><s%>.
Let thy priests <S%H3548><s%> be clothed <S%H3847><s%> with righteousness <S%H6664><s%>; and let thy saints <S%H2623><s%> shout for joy <S%H7442><s%>.
For thy servant <S%H5650><s%> David's <S%H1732><s%> sake turn not away <S%H7725><s%> the face <S%H6440><s%> of thine anointed <S%H4899><s%>.

The LORD <S%H3068><s%> hath sworn <S%H7650><s%> in truth <S%H571><s%> unto David <S%H1732><s%>; he will not turn <S%H7725><s%> from it; Of the fruit <S%H6529><s%> of thy body <S%H990><s%> will I set <S%H7896><s%> upon thy throne <S%H3678><s%>. body: Heb. belly

If thy children <S%H1121><s%> will keep <S%H8104><s%> my covenant <S%H1285><s%> and my testimony <S%H5713><s%> that <S%H2090><s%> <S%H2097><s%> I shall teach <S%H3925><s%> them, their children <S%H1121><s%> shall also sit <S%H3427><s%> upon thy throne <S%H3678><s%> for evermore <S%H5703><s%>.
For the LORD <S%H3068><s%> hath chosen <S%H977><s%> Zion <S%H6726><s%>; he hath desired <S%H183><s%> it for his habitation <S%H4186><s%>.
This is my rest <S%H4496><s%> for ever <S%H5703><s%>: here will I dwell <S%H3427><s%>; for I have desired <S%H183><s%> it.
I will abundantly <S%H1288><s%> bless <S%H1288><s%> her provision <S%H6718><s%>: I will satisfy <S%H7646><s%> her poor <S%H34><s%> with bread <S%H3899><s%>. abundantly: or, surely
I will also clothe <S%H3847><s%> her priests <S%H3548><s%> with salvation <S%H3468><s%>: and her saints <S%H2623><s%> shall shout aloud <S%H7442><s%> for joy <S%H7444><s%>.

There will I make <S%H6779><s%> the horn <S%H7161><s%> of David <S%H1732><s%> to bud <S%H6779><s%>: I have ordained <S%H6186><s%> a lamp <S%H5216><s%> for mine anointed <S%H4899><s%>. lamp: or, candle
His enemies <S%H341><s%> will I clothe <S%H3847><s%> with shame <S%H1322><s%>: but upon himself shall his crown <S%H5145><s%> flourish <S%H6692><s%>.
